headline: Looking at the Narrative for Citizens Financial Group as Analyst Confidence Rises
summary: Citizens Financial Group has recently seen its consensus analyst price target edge up slightly, climbing from $61.48 to $61.73. This adjustment follows a period of increased analyst confidence, reflected in a series of upward revisions and ratings upgrades as a response to the company's steady business momentum and improving profitability. Stay tuned to discover how investors can stay ahead as the story around Citizens Financial continues to develop. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture...
